cause.description:
People of the free world must learn to appreciate the true freedoms that they have: the ability to speak out against authority, the ability to live their lives without any direct interference from a totalitarian regime.
In Belarus, when you speak out against the president, you are either: kicked out of school, black-listed from work, are killed, disappear or are continually harassed.
Belarus is the last undemocratic country on the European continent. Thousands of young people are fleeing the country. When all the intelligent ones have left, what will become of Belarus?
Lukashenka must be stopped!
Down with Europe's last tyranny!
